thread.title: BRIEF-Crescent Point Recommends Shareholders Vote For Co's Director Nominees

title: BRIEF-Crescent Point Recommends Shareholders Vote For Co's Director Nominees

organizations.name: brief-crescent point recommends shareholders vote for co

text:
April 20, 2018 / 7:54 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Crescent Point Recommends Shareholders Vote For Co's Director Nominees Reuters Staff 
April 20 (Reuters) - Crescent Point Energy Corp: * CRESCENT POINT REINFORCES ITS CURRENT PLAN FOR CHANGE 
* SAYS EXPRESS ITS “DISAPPOINTMENT” WITH RECENT REPORT ISSUED BY INSTITUTIONAL SHAREHOLDER SERVICES 
* SAYS RECOMMEND SHAREHOLDERS VOTE FOR CO’S DIRECTOR NOMINEES & OTHER ITEMS AT ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
